Keywords: Celebrity , Mystical , Past
Real Name: Agatha Harkness
Special Powers
TARGETING: Characters
THE BOOK OF THE DAMNED: Agatha Harkness starts the game with a Disney+ #s008 Darkhold equipped. // When she uses its EFFECT, she may instead choose 2 listed powers.
THESE ARE RUNES, WANDA: POWER: Generate a Rune special marker [MAX 1] in Agatha Harkness's square. // If Agatha Harkness is more than 3 squares from a Rune marker, remove her Rune marker. // Other characters within 3 squares of her Rune marker can't use powers.
IT WAS AGATHA ALL ALONG: Stealth, Mind Control. // FREE: If Agatha Harkness occupies hindering terrain, place her in a square of hindering terrain within 4 squares and line of fire.
GIVE ME YOUR POWER AND I WILL CORRECT THE FLAWS IN YOUR ORIGINAL SPELL: Penetrating/Psychic Blast. Steal Energy, but with close or range attacks.

Post Comment
Comments
June 14, 2022
Oathful
Between the Agatha and Wanda chases, this is the one I want most. While Wanda definitely hits harder, Agatha here has a lot more staying power, if she even gets hit in the first place. With her plethora of powers she can fill almost any role your team needs. Icing on the cake is the ability to hop from hindering to hindering. The Rune marker, while good on paper, means you have to get a lot closer that I'd like to activate it. I'd really only use it if she gets based as a defensive option, but if you have someone with Smoke Cloud you could make some really nasty plays with it I'm sure. Thematic: 9/10 Viability: 9.5/10 Fun Factor: 9/10, fairly balanced figure
May 15, 2022
Goop
This is an incredibly strong piece, especially getting to choose 2 from darkshold just makes her very scary. Turning off all opponents powers that get close to her is also just unbelievable. The stealth on her is what really puts her over the edge with that marker. Yeah i wish she had some move and attack but overall just a great great piece.
April 11, 2022
Sylpharium
Agatha is an absolute monster. That rune drop can drastically change the flow of a game. Top tier chase for this set and the one I want most.
April 9, 2022
Xavolice
Wow this girl is incredible! Darkhold is already amazing, but getting it free and choosing 2! And rune can be very powerful in locking down a location.
